code:
class Solution:
    def differenceOfDistinctValues(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> List[List[int]]:
        n, m = len(grid), len(grid[0])
        ans = []
        for i in range(0, n):
            temp = []
            for j in range(0, m):
                x, y = i - 1, j - 1
                st1, st2 = set(), set()
                while x>=0 and y>=0:
                    st1.add(grid[x][y])
                    x-=1
                    y-=1
                x, y = i + 1, j + 1
                while x<n and y<m:
                    st2.add(grid[x][y])
                    x+=1
                    y+=1
                t = (abs(len(st1) - len(st2)))
                temp.append(t)
            ans.append(temp)
        return ans
